activities: Performance Assessment Network, Inc. (pan) is an application service provider that enables our clients to administer various assessment instruments to current and prospective employees via our web-based platforms.  Our clients access our system and the data for the assessment of job candidates.  Individuals involved in these assessments interact directly with our clients, rather than with pan.  pan is a “data processor” for our clients who operate as “data controllers” of personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other data: American Arbritation Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
